DataElement.preferredName: Study Site Investigator Contact Person Role Code ParticipationContactRoleType
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event.:A system, often of numbered categories, used for representation of data._The code that describes the responsibility of the contact at a particular study site.

The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group._The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event.:A system, often of numbered categories, used for representation of data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject). Concepts.definition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

Property.preferredDefinition: The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event.:A system, often of numbered categories, used for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: The usual or expected function of something; the part something plays in an action or event.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 7/22/2021wz: released for UML model cleanup project.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The code that describes the responsibility of the contact at a particular study site.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person worthy of responsibility or trust or one held accountable.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

Concepts.definition: A person worthy of responsibility or trust or one held accountable.
A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Clinical Study Site Primary Contact Person

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Clinical Study Site Primary Contact Person
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.:A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

Concepts.definition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.
Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.
A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.

Concepts.definition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.
An investigator who is responsible for all aspects of the conduct of a study.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.:Any individual member of the clinical trial team designated and supervised by the investigator at a trial site to perform critical trial-related procedures and/or to make important trial-related decisions (e.g., associates, residents, research fellows).

Concepts.definition: A healthcare organization, an institution, a facility, a healthcare provider, or a part or a constituent of any of the above entities directly involved in conducting a particular clinical study.

Any individual member of the clinical trial team designated and supervised by the investigator at a trial site to perform critical trial-related procedures and/or to make important trial-related decisions (e.g., associates, residents, research fellows).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Type; a subdivision of a particular kind of thing.

Concepts.definition: Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
